merpi_desc: %USER's horns. Round or pointy, long or curled. They're made for doing something rough when there's no point being sheepish about it.

merpi_normal: %USER smashes %THEIR horns into %TARGET's %T_PART like an angry goat!!
merpi_flowery: %USER rears back, pushing their horns out in front of them before slamming them into %TARGET's %T_PART like a savage animal!!
%USER presses their horns into %TARGET's %T_PART gently, easing the protuberances back and forth as they do so.
%USER pops their horns against %TARGET's %T_PART playfully, teasing the %T_PART with the protuberances.
%USER presses their horns down against %TARGET's %T_PART fully, it's not a hard pressure.  Instead it feels like they're just resting against the %T_PART.
merpi_repeat: %USER really presses on %TARGET's %T_PART with their horns!

merpi_flowery: %USER rears back slightly and slaps their horns against %TARGET's %T_PART as if giving a warning!

merpi_normal: %USER presses down hard on %TARGET's %T_PART with %THEIR horns!
merpi_flowery: %USER pushes their horns down hard against %TARGET's %T_PART, grinding the things back and forth across the %T_PART almost uncomfortably.
%USER pulls their head back all the way before bearing their horns down hard on %TARGET's %T_PART, that probably hurt!

merpi_normal: %USER is just flat out trying to shove %TARGET's %T_PART out of the way with %THEIR horns!
merpi_flowery: %USER bulls against %TARGET's %T_PART with their horns, trying to shove the %T_PART around without really holding back!

merpi_normal: %USER bludgeons the shit out of %TARGET's %T_PART with %THEIR horns!
merpi_flowery: %USER full on hornbutts %TARGET's %T_PART, the sound of their horns and the %T_PART colliding reverbing slightly as they dig the horns in viciously!
